title: r-rgdal Test Error
body:
When I tested r-rgdal, I reported an error and did not find the official community of r-rgdal for feedback and communication. Can you take a look at this problem?
r-rgdal version:1.5-23 and 1.5-19
os:centos8
platform:linux aarch64
**Test commands:
spack load r-rgdal
cd testts && Rscript tests.R**
**Error report:**
Error in getRasterData(x, band = 4) : Null external pointer

Error in .local(.Object, ...) :

Error in .local(.Object, ...) : No driver registered with name: GeoTIFF

Warning message:
In GDALinfo(fn) : statistics not supported by this driver
Error in getRasterData(x, band = band, offset = offset, region.dim = region.dim,  :
  Failure during raster IO

Error in getRasterData(x, band = band, offset = offset, region.dim = region.dim,  :
  Failure during raster IO

Error in .local(.Object, ...) : Unable to create dataset

In addition: Warning message:
In create2GDAL(dataset = dataset, drivername = drivername, type = type,  :
  mvFlag=NA unsuitable for type Byte
Error in .local(.Object, ...) : No driver registered with name: GeoTiff

In addition: Warning message:
In create2GDAL(dataset = dataset, drivername = drivername, type = type,  :
  mvFlag=NA unsuitable for type Byte
Error in ogrInfo(dsn = dsn, layer = "citis") : Cannot open layer
Error in OGRSpatialRef(dsn = dsn, layer = "scot_BMG") : Cannot open layer
Error in ogrInfo(dsn = dsn, layer = layer, encoding = encoding, use_iconv = use_iconv,  :
  Cannot open data source
Error in writeOGR(cities, td, "cities", driver = "ESRI_Shapefile") :
  No such driver: ESRI_Shapefile

**Test commands:**
Rscript srs_rendering.R
**Error report:**
Warning message:
In OGRSpatialRef(d, "scot_BNG") :
  Discarded datum OSGB_1936 in Proj4 definition: +proj=tmerc +lat_0=49 +lon_0=-2 +k=0.9996012717 +x_0=400000 +y_0=-100000 +ellps=airy +units=m +no_defs
[1] "PROJCRS[\"OSGB 1936 / British National Grid\",\n    BASEGEOGCRS[\"OSGB 1936\",\n        DATUM[\"OSGB 1936\",\n            ELLIPSOID[\"Airy 1830\",6377563.396,299.3249646,\n                LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]]],\n        PRIMEM[\"Greenwich\",0,\n            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433]],\n        ID[\"EPSG\",4277]],\n    CONVERSION[\"British National Grid\",\n        METHOD[\"Transverse Mercator\",\n            ID[\"EPSG\",9807]],\n        PARAMETER[\"Latitude of natural origin\",49,\n            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n            ID[\"EPSG\",8801]],\n        PARAMETER[\"Longitude of natural origin\",-2,\n            ANGLEUNIT[\"degree\",0.0174532925199433],\n            ID[\"EPSG\",8802]],\n        PARAMETER[\"Scale factor at natural origin\",0.9996012717,\n            SCALEUNIT[\"unity\",1],\n            ID[\"EPSG\",8805]],\n        PARAMETER[\"False easting\",400000,\n            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n            ID[\"EPSG\",8806]],\n        PARAMETER[\"False northing\",-100000,\n            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1],\n            ID[\"EPSG\",8807]]],\n    CS[Cartesian,2],\n        AXIS[\"(E)\",east,\n            ORDER[1],\n            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n        AXIS[\"(N)\",north,\n            ORDER[2],\n            LENGTHUNIT[\"metre\",1]],\n    USAGE[\n        SCOPE[\"Engineering survey, topographic mapping.\"],\n        AREA[\"United Kingdom (UK) - offshore to boundary of UKCS within 49\302\26045'N to 61\302\260N and 9\302\260W to 2\302\260E; onshore Great Britain (England, Wales and Scotland). Isle of Man onshore.\"],\n        BBOX[49.75,-9,61.01,2.01]],\n    ID[\"EPSG\",27700]]"
Error in ogrListLayers(dsn) : Cannot open data source
Calls: OGRSpatialRef -> ogrListLayers
Execution halted
